author: cnbc.com
title: Cotiviti Announces Conference Call to Review First Quarter 2018 Results
text:
ATLANTA--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Cotiviti Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: COTV ) (“Cotiviti”), a leading provider of payment accuracy and analytics-driven solutions primarily focused on the healthcare industry, will release financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018 after market close on Tuesday, May 1, 2018, and hold a conference call on Wednesday, May 2, 2018 at 8:30 a.m. (ET).
To participate in the conference call, domestic callers can dial (877) 883-0383 and international callers can dial (412) 902-6506 and provide the following conference passcode: 3845310. In order to ensure enough time to register prior to the call, please dial in at least ten minutes prior to the start time.
The call will also be webcast live and be accessible on the Investors page of Cotiviti’s website at http://investors.cotiviti.com . To listen to the live call, please go to the website at least ten minutes early to register and download any necessary audio software.
For those who cannot access the live broadcast, a replay will be available by dialing (877) 344-7529 for domestic callers or (412) 317-0088 for international callers and entering 10118501. The replay will be available from one hour after the live broadcast ends until 11:59 p.m. (Eastern) on May 9, 2018. The webcast will also be available at Cotiviti's website http://investors.cotiviti.com through June 1, 2018.
About Cotiviti
Cotiviti is a leading provider of payment accuracy and analytics-driven solutions that helps payers, other risk-bearing healthcare organizations and retailers achieve their business objectives. Through a combination of analytics, technology and deep industry expertise, our solutions create insights that unlock value from the complex interactions between clients and their stakeholders. Cotiviti serves a majority of the top 25 U.S. healthcare payers and a majority of the top 10 U.S. retailers. Cotiviti’s passion for creating unique client value drives our focus – Analytics. Insight. Value.
